name: Slashyguy and the Cursed Forest
description:
A simple short 3-5 minute game I threw together in about 24 hours for the GBJAM7 game jam. You play as Slashyguy, fight your way through 8 levels of bats and slimes to lift the curse from the forest.

Controls
A: Attack
S: Use potion
Arrow keys: Move
F: Toggle Fullscreen
